front.title: Datagram TLS Secure RTP (DTLS-SRTP) Key Transport

abstract.t: The existing DTLS-SRTP specification allows SRTP keys to be established between a pair of SRTP endpoints. However, when there are more than two participants in an RTP session, DTLS-SRTP is unable to provide a single key for all of the participants. This document describes an extension to DTLS-SRTP which transports SRTP keying material from one DTLS-SRTP peer to another, so the same SRTP keying material can be used by multiple DTLS-SRTP peers. This reduces or eliminates the need to key each SRTP session individually.
